intro.greet:
Hello, I'm Robby!
I come from Taiwan and graduated from the Graduate Institute of Information Management at the National Taichung University of Science and Technology.
I am currently working at Mapxus, and I look forward to making a significant impact in this field.
Nice to meet you!

companies.name: Taiwan Mapxus Technology Limited
companies.description: Mapxus provides innovative indoor mapping and navigation solutions that help users easily navigate through complex indoor environments. Our technology is used in large venues such as shopping malls, airports, and hospitals, significantly enhancing the user experience. I am currently responsible for the development of the mapping system at Mapxus.

companies.name: Linkage Retail Solutions Limited
companies.job: Technical Manager (Head of Taiwan), Front-End Engineer
companies.description: I work for a Hong Kong company specializing in digital transformation solutions for the retail industry. I lead the Taiwan team, overseeing development and operations. Beyond front-end development, my focus is on project management and team coordination. I'm honored to have earned the trust of the company and the team, and I'm grateful for these opportunities.

companies.name: Avidcon Co., Ltd.
companies.description: This is a multiplayer online fighting game 'Crossing Frontier'. I was responsible for building the official website and the pre-registration website using technologies like React.js and Vue.js.

companies.name: Sick Games Co., Ltd.
companies.description: Dedicated to the development of the game '我滿懷歧異的意識代碼'. The development framework was iterated using Pixi.js, and I was mainly responsible for the development of game scenes and interactions.

companies.name: Ysong Technology Co., Ltd.
companies.description: Participated in government projects for GIS system construction and documentation, which also laid the foundation for my knowledge in the GIS field.

companies.name: Kai Yuan Customs Broker Co., Ltd.
companies.description: Worked as an assistant in the information department of a customs brokerage company, mainly handling MIS tasks. At the starting point of my programming career, I am always grateful for the book recommendations from my mentors, especially《 大話設計模式 》.
